alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 1:50PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Brief heavy snow will impact portions of Clinton, northeastern Essex, Lamoille, northwestern Orleans, northwestern Addison, Grand Isle, Chittenden, northwestern Washington and Franklin Counties through 230 PM EST... At 149 PM EST, heavy snow showers were reported near Milton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated and webcams. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility may pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, Plattsburgh International Airport, Burlington, Burlington International Airport, Plattsburgh, South Burlington, Montpelier, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Chazy, Saranac, Mooers, Altona, Willsboro, Morrisville, Enosburg Falls, Wilmington, Elizabethtown and Keene. This includes the following highways... Interstate 87 between mile markers 118 and 174. Interstate 89 between mile markers 53 and 128.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Western Clinton; Western Essex
